## Vector3.addToRef() method

Adds the current Vector3 to the given one and stores the result in the vector "result"

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addToRef(otherVector: ReadOnlyVector3, result: Vector3): Vector3;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  otherVector | <code>ReadOnlyVector3</code> | defines the second operand |
|  result | <code>Vector3</code> | defines the Vector3 object where to store the result |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Vector3`

the current Vector3
